name: dooub
tag_list: mobile-game, ios, android, kpop, k-pop, rhythm-action, music, social-network, sns
overview:
dooub, Inc. was founded and headquartered in Seoul in April 2011 with its focus on connecting people through mobile and web-based applications.

dooub has released several games and applications for mobile devices and Facebook, which amassed over 5 million unique users across the world.

The Musician SHAKE Series is a rhythm-action game platform for individual artists which features two game modes: the traditional “TAP” style of gameplay and a new “SHAKE” mode, using a seamless-gesture technology developed by dooub. The “SHAKE” mode will provide a new style of gameplay, where users may feel like a DJ scratching the turntable.

The game also provides the Card Deck System. This system compensates the users with cards that fans can collect, which includes unreleased pictures of the stars. The cards itself can also be used as an item during the game to gain benefits.

Beginning with SM Entertainment, dooub has released 16 Musician SHAKE Series so far, including Super Junior, BIGBANG, Girls’ Generation, 2PM, and so on. dooub plans to turn the Musician SHAKE Project into a new business model for K-Pop and develop into a communication channel between fans and the artists across the world.

dooub plans to release new style of music game called ‘Tap N Shake’ and a social network that focuses on spreading ideas based on user’s location.

Further information on dooub, Inc. and its games can be found at http://company.dooub.com/.
